description: Describes a patch of a network flow.
title: Network flow with attributes that can be patched

bandwidth.description: Average bandwidth requirement for the flow, formatted as a number followed by kbit/s, Mbit/s, Gbit/s. NB: Values should be formatted with no fraction component if possible, using the largest unit that allows that.

profile.description: The transmission profile of the flow.

forward_flow.description: Flag for forwarding the flow. If false, the network should not set up the flow. Only when this flag is changed to true should the flow be sent to all receivers.

dscp.description: DSCP based QoS metrics number, default is CS0, best effort.

label.description: Freeform string label for the network-flow
